definition: patch (for mending clothes, tires etc)/(software) patch
to repair/to patch/to mend/to make up for/to fill (a vacancy)/to supplement
fourth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fourth in order/letter "D" or Roman "IV" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 195°/butyl/cubes (of food)

sentences.english: I could literally count the patches on the ripstop nylon.
sentences.chinese: 我甚至能夠精確地數清防刮尼龍傘上的補丁。

sentences.english: Here is a new test patch W41.
What aresuperstitions? They are patches for the holes and defects of our knowledge and view.
sentences.chinese: 甚麼是迷信？我們知識與見解中的漏洞與不足的補丁。

sentences.english: These two methods provide the ability to apply fixpacks using the command line interface.
sentences.chinese: 這兩個方法提供了通過命令行接口應用補丁包的能力。

sentences.english: Tinea capitis is manifested by pustular eruptions of the scalp, with scaling and bald patches.
sentences.chinese: 頭癬是補丁表現爲膿皰爆發的禿頭頭皮，具有縮放和。

sentences.english: All you can do is uninstall the updates you have received.
sentences.chinese: 你所能做的就是刪除你接收到的補丁。

sentences.english: Levi's patch at back right waist.
sentences.chinese: 利維的補丁在右後方腰。

sentences.english: Those are put in the galosh on the balcony, the majority made a patch.
sentences.chinese: 那些放在陽臺上的套鞋，絕大部分是打了補丁的。

sentences.english: Feedback (of any kind) and patches are always welcome.
sentences.chinese: 任何形式的反饋或者補丁向來都是受歡迎的。

sentences.english: You can also apply all fixes that are applicable for a given virtual system.
sentences.chinese: 還可以應用適合某個給定虛擬系統的所有補丁。

sentences.english: Users are advised to upgrade to these packages.
sentences.chinese: 所以，紅帽建議用戶悉數升級這些補丁。

sentences.english: It also includes support for patches and uninstalling program.
sentences.chinese: 可以支持補丁和卸載程序。

sentences.english: Small white speckled or powdery-looking patches appear on the surface of the nail plate .
sentences.chinese: 白色的小斑點或粉狀前瞻性補丁出現在釘板表面。

sentences.english: You do not need to install the patch or snapshot.
sentences.chinese: 所以您不需要安裝補丁或者快照了。

sentences.english: However, a patch is needed to make correct conversions.
sentences.chinese: 但是，執行正確轉換需要一個補丁程序。

definition: mojibake (nonsense characters displayed when software fails to render text according to its intended character encoding)
to keep one's calm in the face of the unexpected/not to wonder at strange sights
